text: Nicholas Burfitt (born 17 December 1966) is a British rower. He competed at the 1988 Summer Olympics and the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:British male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Great Britain Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:People from Keynsham
title: Nicholas Burfitt
